phrases: Everyone is happy with your cooking.
How does a wall just break?
How the heck am I supposed to know?
You were trying to, and that is a crime!
How do you know we brought our towels?
I will not get mad if you say it now.
The guys have been getting by going commando, but what about the girls?
I will really be on the same level as Ranta
Damuro was much bigger than Ortana, and is now a base for goblins.
We need to keep this up.
we could have clothes for wearing indoors, too, would not that be nice?
I do not think I like that kind of thing, to ask for favors.
You are not even on breakfast duty.
Do you like making or eating food better?
I think I liked cooking for people.
Aside from whether or not it made them happy.
Everyone is happy with your cooking.
I will go wake everyone up.
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
How does a wall just break?
How... the heck am I supposed to know?
It is not like we saw anything.
There are not any in this town!
Why did you bring your hand towels in with you, anyway?
Just a little more and... damn.
It is not like I-I would want to l-look at a flat-chested girl like you!
I will not get mad if you say it now.
It just means we were too inexperienced.
Y-You said you would not get mad!
I-I did not see anything anyway.
I am never going to talk to you again!
Everyone is in a bad mood.
It is still a little warm.
We might catch up to them.
It is not a lone poplin, huh.
I think you mean goblin not poplin.
It might take a while for Shihoru.
Maybe it is okay if it is you.
I am not saying it would be okay if it were you who saw.
It is just that even if you did, you would apologize...
But it is not that just because you apologized, it is okay either...
You are just repeating seen a lot...
I am not the person to ask...
But, it was not right, huh.
All we can do is go back to Ortana.
Gray pains but all for vain, huh.
You meant, great pains but all in vain, right?
When I say barely, I mean close to nothing.
Well, to be honest, we made nothing.
The clothes we started off with quickly began to wear down.
Well, they were not made to withstand hiking mountain trails and fighting goblins.
So we do what we can to make them last, but...
I would give anything for new underwear...
But the clothes in this world are expensive.
At least, because we are so poor we cannot buy anything.
So at night, we wash them and sleep without them.
Then in the morning, we put them on under our equipment.
It is better than no underwear at all.
My goal tomorrow is to defeat a goblin and buy new underwear.
I smelled a faintly sweet scent.
We have been going without underwear...
I will sink down to Ranta's level.
It is not good if they are dressed like that.
It is just too much if they wander around the lodging like that.
Th-This is not good, I will really be on the same
Nothing's going to dry even if you wash them.
Why do not you wash stuff tomorrow?
I do not know if the rain will let up tomorrow.
You are the one who told me to wash my clothes once in a while'because they stink, Parupiro.
What I am trying to say is, I regret washing my stuff today.
I cannot let King Shameless here get near the girls right now.
This sense of duty drove me to act.
I was thinking maybe the girls were there, muhaha.
The way they are dressed is too tempting.
I have got to tell them.
They say it was the second city of the Arabakia Kingdom.
It was much bigger city than Ortana.
Currently Damuro was a base for goblins.
Goblins found near the new city area are numerous and strong.
Too difficult for us to defeat.
That is why we are going to the old city area to target goblins separated from their groups.
That said, compared to the forest, we have more encounters, so it is still dangerous.
Moguzo's armor will make sound, so Haruhiro, Ranta, and I will approach first.
If we can close in on the goblin without waking him, the three of us will finish him.
If we wake him, Yume, use your bow.
Shihoru, back us up with magic from a distance.
Moguzo, you will run to the front.
If it becomes a head-on fight, we will use the same formation as before.
We will surround him, so he cannot get away.
It is so easy... to attack them in their sleep.
I need to get a claw or something.
Wow, this is our best record yet.
It is only our second time, though.
We were lucky that it was easy today, but it will not always be like this.
Keep your guard up and look for our next target.
C'mon, do not be such a killjoy.
We just had a huge win, thanks to me!
I do not mind enjoying it.
You were a big help, too.
Did not I really seem like a Dark Knight when I wore a cruel smile as I stabbed the gob?
No, you were just as worked up as usual.
I got him good without a hitch!
Oh, I see them, right there!
Your eyes are such small slits, I barely noticed them!
Just say something, you going to leave me hanging?!
How many times is it now?
Everybody was probably on edge, because they were worried, too.
Before we know it, maybe we will be thinking and acting like Volunteer Soldiers.
After that, we targeted lone goblins and defeated them.
In Damuro, we sometimes encountered groups of five or more.
A pair was hard enough, so five was out of the question.
But still, we enjoyed the task of walking around the old town and sketching out a map.
We would go explore places we had not been to yet.
With that, we had a goal set, so we learned our way around, too.
We would get nervous when we stepped into new areas.
And we felt a little better in places we had mapped already.
I would consider it for fifteen coppers.
Brand new, it would go for a hundred coppers.
I would go as far as twenty coppers.
I still have other things to buy.
I cannot go lower than that.
Did you actually want him to talk to you?
There were a lot of nicks in the blade, huh.
Before anything else, I have got to keep my weapons in good condition.
With thoughts like these, do you think we have become influenced by Volunteer Soldiers too much?
Ranta-kun kept haggling, so it was pretty hectic.
Stupid, it is common sense to haggle.
There is too much, the food's going to go bad before we can finish it.
If it rots, I will give it to you.
It is okay to buy weapons, clothes, and food...
If I sharpen my Dark Knight blade skills, it might be too much to handle!
Whatever, you only have one skill right now.
I am going to polish up that one skill all the way!
Until it shines with dark light!
You are more deft than you look, Moguzo.
Oh, that was not my intention...
Yume and them might like it.
What made you think of Yume just now?
I just thought they might like it.
If we earn a little extra...
Shihoru, that hair clip is super cute.
Shihoru, I know you have not been talking to the guys this whole time.
But I think it is about time that you could try, just a little bit.
Well, you do not have to try.
But, I get worried when you are always quiet, too.
I am not too good with words.
I was actually about to say something completely different.
I am the one who is grateful.
That is because... you are all willing to be my friends.
It sounds a little fake when I say it like this.
You are the one who is been helping us.
If you were not here, we would be in bad shape.
Worst case, we might not even be alive.
If you guys were not here, I do not know what would have happened to me.
You cannot live in this world alone, no matter how you look at it.
I do not want you to take this the wrong way...
You could just ask for a favor and see if you could join their party.
I did not think of that.
I do not think I like that kind of thing.
Maybe I was bad at dealing with hierarchical relationships.
I am not the kind of person people usually treat as a friend.
That is just what I think, but I cannot back it up.
It is true that I only know the Manato in this world.
It does not matter what you were like before.
The Manato in this world is our friend and leader.
We have an early day tomorrow.
I was not sure if I wanted to see the expression on his face right now.
I have gotten used to the red moon.
People can get used to any kind of environment.
the dry air after a rain,
The warmth you gave this hand
led me to a future I can treasure
I wonder when you became so strong.
I will probably find what I searched the vast world for
at the end of this journey.
Are Goblin Pouches Filled with Our Dreams?
Now serialized on the official anime web site.
